attributes.action: Allow a second EU Referendum with 16+ voting age.
attributes.background: Britain has voted to leave the EU. Or has it? The fact is that the changes this causes will affect people in the distant future. The next generation. Having a vote without 16/17 year olds is ridiculous, as it is their future it will affect.

rejection.details:
The EU referendum has already taken place. It is therefore no longer possible for the franchise (the groups of people who are entitled to vote) to be changed.

If you would like the UK voting age to be lowered to 16, you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/119769
